name: Ask.fm rounded profil picture and stream
description: This theme ask.fm allows the user to have profile pictures and photo in the stream round. It also changes the font header.
additional_info:
V1.2 - Flat Header Version
  • Ask.fm logo centered
  • logo on the top of the menu
  • Flat Menu
V1.1 - No ad Version
  • Removed Ad section
V1.0 - Initial version
  • Rounded Picture Profil in profil page
  • Rounded Picture Profil in Stream and Answer Page
  • Fonts
  • Section removed @USERNAME
